name: preboot
description: Record and play back browser events

scripts.lint: ./node_modules/tslint/bin/tslint -c tslint.json src/**/*.ts src/*.ts test/**/*.ts test/*.ts || true
scripts.dist: rm -rf __dist && mkdir __dist && ./node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs __build/src/inline/preboot_inline.js -o __dist/preboot_inline.min.js && ./node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs __build/src/browser/preboot_browser.js -o __dist/preboot_browser.min.js && cp __build/src/inline/preboot_inline.js __dist && cp __build/src/browser/preboot_browser.js __dist && node __build/src/build/strip-export || true
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run dist && cp examples/preboot_examples.html __dist && node __build/src/build/setup-examples && node __build/src/build/run-examples || true
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run dist || true

author: Jeff Whelpley
